message: I am the new Feygard bridge guard. Har har. We do not let beggars through. Understand? Come back, but only if you have more gold with you.
I am the new Feygard bridge guard. Har har. Give me your gold.

replies.text: OK. Here, you can have 50 pieces of gold. Let me pass now.
Come and try to get it.
Hmm, I will think about your offer.

message:
[Gold taken]
Very good. But I need more.

replies.text: Of course. Here, you can have another 50 pieces of gold.
Enough!
Hm, I will think about your offer.

message: Sorry, the road to Feygard is closed until further notice.

replies.text: Oh? Is it the fog that is the problem?

message: Yes. Several men already got lost and never reappeared. There is no way through.
Welcome! Nice to see you again.
Good morning! Did you hear the music last night? I think it came from the castle.
What is a kid like you doing all alone on the road?

replies.text: I am looking for my brother Andor. Have you seen him by any chance?
I am tired and hungry. Do you have a place to rest, please?
None of your business.

message: No, sorry. We seldom see strangers in the area. But you could ask at Guynmart Castle. Just follow the road to the north, you can't miss it.

replies.text: Guynmart Castle? I have never heard of it. Please tell me more.

message: Our land belongs to Guynmart Castle, but old Guynmart is a friendly and rightious man. He never takes too much from us.

replies.text: N

message: Young Lady Hannah of Guynmart Castle often comes to visit us. A lovely girl she is. But she has not been here for a week now. I wonder if everything is all right.

replies.text: N

message: I have too much work to do now. But maybe you could check if everything is OK with her?

replies.text: Yes, of course. I will come back and tell you what I find out.
No, sorry. I have to press on again. Bye.
I will go tomorrow. But now I am tired and hungry. Do you have a place to rest, please?

message: Yes of course. Go inside, there is some food left, and some cushions in the corner behind the oven. I will join you later.

replies.text: Great. Thank you.

message: Hi! Any news from Guynmart castle?

replies.text: Oh yes, it is a long story. Maybe I could stay overnight and tell you all about it in detail?
Yes, but I want to learn more about what is going on before I am willing to discuss it.

message: With pleasure. Just go inside and make yourself comfortable on the cushions in the corner behind the oven. We will talk when my work is done.

replies.text: Great. Thank you.

message: Grrrrrr
Hello stranger. Who are you and where are you going?

replies.text: I am $playername, and come from the castle.

message: From the castle? You did not come here the usual way.

replies.text: You are right. I had a misunderstanding with Unkorh the steward and he threw me off the north wall. Now I am looking for a way back.

message: You were kicked out? And still want to go back? You must explain that.

replies.text: I spoke to Lady Hannah there. She bade me to find her betrothed, who has been missing for a week now.

message:
Lovis is missing? That is bad news.
But where are my manners? I am questioning you and haven't even introduced myself. I am Norgothla, head of Guynmart's personal guard, and these are my men.

replies.text: Nice to meet you, Norgothla.

message: You say Lovis is missing? I would like to look around the castle, but we are ordered to stay here.

replies.text: Ordered?

message: I take orders only from Lord Guynmart himself. He told me and my men to go to this clearing and wait for him.

replies.text: That is strange. I heard at the castle that Lord Guynmart was uproad for a week now.

message: Yes, Lord Guynmart was already on the way. Unkorh forwarded his order to me.

replies.text: I also heard other things that I dare not tell.

message: You must tell me all that you know or think you know. I promise that you have nothing to fear.

replies.text: I heard Unkorh saying that Guynmart is imprisoned in the dungeons. And Unkorh also wants to marry Lady Hannah.

message: Indeed? These are serious accusations. I hope you can prove them.

replies.text: How can I? You may go to the castle and check for yourself.

message:
Now I am really curious what is going on in the castle. But unfortunately Guynmart's order was very clear. Myself and all my men should wait for him in this clearing.
I can't leave just based on the words of a kid.

replies.text: And let Unkorh's dark plans be fulfilled? Leave Guynmart to probably die?
Maybe I could go back and bring some evidence?

message: Maybe you could go back to the castle and bring some evidence?

replies.text: With pleasure, if this means you will believe me.

message: By doing this, you take a great burden from my heart. I get to know what is happening at the castle, but don't have to disobey my lords order. Please hurry, the path is not difficult to find.

replies.text: OK, I will be as quick as I can.

message: Halt! Talk to Norgothla before you walk around here!
Go away, kid.
Go away, kid. I am depressed.

replies.text: N

message: They have all gone, and forgotten me here. *Sigh*

replies.text: Oh my.

message: Hey! You are the first one that has found the way to my clearing!

replies.text: N

message: I like this place very much. Each time I return here, I get a surprise.
Cool place here, isn't it?
I like the clearing best this way.
A little too hot for my taste.
I don't even know what this is supposed to be!
This is strange!
Back to normal.
Hello $playername. Do you wish to climb up to me?

replies.text: Yes. Could you drop the rope down?
No thanks.

message: Of course. There. But I am in a hurry and must leave now.

replies.text: Great! I'll climb up now.

message: Grumble ... grumble ...

replies.text: He seems to speak mostly to his dogs.

message: Grrumble ... grrrrumble ...

replies.text: Maybe he does not like his sheep being killed?

message: GRRRUMMBLE!!!

replies.text: Obviously he does not like his sheep being killed.

message: Baah!

replies.text: Baah!
You look tasty ...

message: Neigh
The left beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: No, the right beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: Nonsense, the left beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: The right beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: Hey, come and join our beetle battle.
*Sob*

replies.text: Don't cry, little one. What's your name?

message: *Sob* ... Stuephant ... *sob*

replies.text: There there now. What's the matter?

message: I have lost my five best marbles!

replies.text: Oh dear, That is all? I will find them for you.
Look, here I have a nice teddy bear for you.
The quicker I leave, the sooner I have silence and peace again.

message: Great - thank you!

replies.text: Much better. Now tell me about your marbles.

message: I have lost them here in the yard or in the field over there.

replies.text: N

message: Five beautiful marbles. Maybe you should look more than once in each place. They are so small you could easily miss them.

replies.text: Don't be so sad, I will find them soon.

message: *Sob* ... so you didn't find my marbles ... *sob*

replies.text: I haven't given up yet. Please be patient.

message: Thank you again for finding my marbles.

My lost marbles! All five! Great, thank you!
[Stuephant takes the marbles]

replies.text: You're welcome.

message: I found a green marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a red marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a pink marble!

replies.text: N

message: Wow - a golden marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a pearl white marble!

replies.text: N

message: That was the last one. I have found them all. Stuephant will be happy.

replies.text: I will go back to him now.

message: Oh, a visitor. Come closer. Do not be afraid of me.

replies.text: I am not afraid. What happened to you?
Eh, I have to go.

message: Oh, it is you again. I am delighted!

replies.text: De-lighted indeed. Might you need anything?

message: It happend in the mines of Mount Galmore. Don't ask any more, I do not wish to recall the memories. It was horrible.

replies.text: N

message: When I returned here at last, people started to avoid me, whispering behind my back. I got very lonely.

replies.text: N

message: Eventually I had enough of all the anxious, disturbed looks, so I came up here on this lonely hill.

replies.text: N

message: From time to time a friendly soul brings me some food, but no one stays for long. I have noticed that their pace uphill is usually much slower than back downhill.

replies.text: N

message: Do you bring bread and wine, together with my favorite cheddar?

replies.text: Yes, finally I got it. I hope the cheddar is still fresh after the long journey.
No, not yet.

message: Do you bring bread, cheese and wine?

replies.text: Yes, here you are. Enjoy it!
No, not yet.

message: No, thank you.

replies.text: N

message: Just recently my supply of bread has run low again. And I haven't seen eggs for such a long time...

replies.text: I can help with that. I can spare 2 loaves of bread.
I could give you 3 eggs.
I could spare bread, some cheese and a bottle of red wine.
Unfortunately I have nothing I could give you.
Sad for you. I have to go now. Bye.

message: Thank you! Thank you very much!

replies.text: N

message: Would it be really outrageous if I asked you to fulfill my heart's desire?

replies.text: Sorry, I really must go now.
Just say what you would like. What can I do for you?

message: I long for a meal with bread and cheese and a good bottle of wine. Oh, what would I give for that?

replies.text: Here I have bread, some cheese and a bottle of red wine.
Really? That is all? I will come back soon.
Be content with what you got, you greedy old man.

message: Oh yes - you get the best cheese in Charwood, if you don't mind!

replies.text: Charwood? That's not exactly next door ...
I have heard of Charwood, but I don't know where it is.
I have heard of Charwood, but I don't know where it is.
Charwood? I have never heard of it.

message: What a feast! I have no words to thank you!

replies.text: N

message: So take this ring as a token of my gratitude. Certain beings in the cellars of Guynmart Castle will not harm you if they see my ring on your finger.

replies.text: The ring looks interesting. Thank you.
N

message: Eh ...

replies.text: Yes?

message: now ...

replies.text: Oh dear! Just say what is on your mind. What's up?

message: The cheese that you brought - It was OK. But it is not the best cheese, you know? The best cheese is from Charwood.

replies.text: Oh?

message: Their Cheddar is a dream! But they sell it only when you explicitly ask for it.

replies.text: No problem. I will go and get some.
I am not going to go all the way to Charwood for some cheddar.
Where is Charwood?

message: Great! I will wait for your return.
Cheddar! I can't belive it!

replies.text: N

message: (eating)

replies.text: N

message: It was nice to talk to you. Come again, as often as you like!

replies.text: Yes, we will meet again.

message: $playername monument - not bad.
